attributes.action: Follow Scotland’s pathway and make sanitary products free in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Women need products free and accessible as women do not choose to have a period every month. An example of unfairness is that condoms are free even though sex is a choice, but sanitary products are not free even though periods are not a choice.
attributes.background: Make all pads and tampons free and accessible. As periods are not a choice.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
